data.title: Are we good friends?
data.description:
Think of one of your friends and answer the questions.
Click next to begin the quiz.

q.text: My friend doesn’t mind when I have plans with other friends or other things to do.
I can be myself around my friend.
My friend and I argue a lot.
I feel happy when I am with my friend.
My friend helps me when I am having trouble with something.
My friend sticks up for me.
If I have a problem, I can talk to my friend about it.
My friend and I have fun together.

data.scores:
Your Score

8 to 12 = Bad News Buddies

Yikes! Do you feel upset when you’re with your friend? Do you feel like it’s not okay to be yourself when you’re with your friend? A good friend should be someone who you like spending time with and who treats you nicely.

13 to 19 = Pretty Good Pals

Friendships change from time to time, but they should usually help you feel safe and happy. Can you think of anything you could do to be better friends?

20 to 24 = Fantastic Friends

It looks like you have a really great friend! That’s fantastic.


Keep reading for more help with friendship
